title: Expose whisper (shh) events
body:
### User Story

As a developer, I want to send whisper messages from extensions.

### Description

Not exactly clear what we want to do here so part of the issue is to come up with a coherent proposal.

*Type*: Feature
@cammellos and @yenda might provide valuable feedback

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 300.0 DAI (300.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/7076/2021). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/7076/2021). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $43,988.14 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)
@jeluard Can you explain the issue a bit more please

In a nutshell it's about exposing [whisper](https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/JSON-RPC#shh_post) functions (all `shh_ ones`) to [extensions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/develop/src/status_im/extensions/core.cljs).

Issue Status: 1. Open 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. **Done** 

<hr>

__Work has been started__.


These users each claimed they can complete the work by 9 months, 1 week from now.
Please review their action plans below:


**1) [elemino](https://gitcoin.co/profile/elemino) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/7076/2021?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=elemino) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/7076/2021?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=elemino))_.**

Will take on this challenge and come up with a proposal pr.

Learn more [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/7076/2021).


**2) [shamardy](https://gitcoin.co/profile/shamardy) has been approved to start work.**

I would like to work on this issue, I have experience working in a previous status issue and I worked with ethereum RPC in parity.

Learn more [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/7076/2021).
@shamardy you've been approved to start work.
